property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the GridPrintingPreference (a Application).

property.name: layoutGridPrinting
property.shortdesc: If true, displays layout grids in the printed or exported document.

property.name: frameGridPrinting
property.shortdesc: If true, displays frame (story) grids in the printed or exported document.

property.name: textPrinting
property.shortdesc: If true, displays text in the printed or exported document.

property.name: pageItemPrinting
property.shortdesc: If true, displays page items other than text, frame grids, and layout grids in the printed or exported document. For information on printing and exporting text and grids, see text printing, frame grid printing, and layout grid printing.

property.name: layoutGridStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight (in points) of the layout grid.

property.name: frameGridStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight (in points) of the frame grid.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the GridPrintingPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
